artist: Paul Storr; Manufacturer: Rundell, Bridge & Rundell
creditline: Gift of Mr. and Mrs. Harold J. Pond
inscription:
Marks; Inscription

Engraved on the center of the stand are the arms, supporters, motto, and coronet of the Pelham-Clinton family.
markings:
Marks

Fully marked on underside of stand.  Maker's mark, lion passant, sovereign's head, and date letter on handle frame.  Maker's mark, lion passant, sovereign's head, and date letter on each neck fitting of bottles.
title: Cruet set
